changelogversion.changelogtext: Migrated to Jetpack Compose with Material 3 design system
Minimum SDK increased to Android 10 (API 29)
Added support for dynamic color on Android 12+
Implemented edge-to-edge UI design
Fixed memory leak in changelog parser
Added dark mode support with automatic theme switching
Introduced customizable content padding
Added retry functionality for error states
Fixed crash when loading empty changelog files
Improved XML parsing performance for large changelogs
Updated dependencies to latest stable versions
Fixed text overflow in long change descriptions
Corrected color scheme for change type indicators
Minor UI improvements and polish
Added support for breaking change type indicator
Implemented loading state with progress indicator
Fixed date parsing for various date formats
Improved accessibility with content descriptions
Added support for optional change dates
Introduced change type categorization (FIX, NEW)
Fixed XML parsing errors with special characters
Enhanced error messages for better debugging
Added version grouping in changelog display
Fixed spacing issues in changelog list
Optimized memory usage during XML parsing
Implemented XML-based changelog format
Added Material Design 3 styling
Fixed rendering issues on tablets
Initial release of changelog-compose library
Basic changelog display functionality
Support for version names and descriptions
Material Design theming support
